content: अवष्टंभः [स्तंभ्-घञ्, सस्य षत्वं] {@--1@} Leaning, resting upon. {@--2@} Support, prop; पक्षाभ्यामीषत्कृतावष्टंभः <ls>K. 34</ls>, <ls n="K.">44</ls>, <ls n="K.">186</ls>, <ls n="K.">231</ls>, <ls n="K.">248</ls>; खडलतावष्टंभनिश्चलः <ls>Māl. 3</ls>; (hence) having recourse to, plucking up or summoning (as courage); तत्कथमहं धैर्यावष्टंभं करोमि <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; so पौरुष°, धीरत्व° <ls>Māl. 2</ls>; सहजसत्त्व° <ls>K. 286.</ls> {@--3@} Haughtiness, pride, dignity, majestic greatness; सावष्टंभाकृतिना <ls>K. 179</ls> dignified, noble, see सावष्टंभ. {@--4@} A post, pillar. {@--5@} Gold. {@--6@} Commencement, beginning. {@--7@} Stopping, standing till, staying. {@--8@} Courage, steadiness; <ls>K. 156</ls>, <ls n="K.">157</ls>; resolute determination; ईदृशोऽस्यावष्टंभः <ls>Ratn. 4</ls>; अविनयकोपितोऽवष्टंभं कृत्वा <ls>K. 261</ls> plucking up courage; पलायनमवष्टंभो वा <ls>Pt. 4</ls> holding out (as opposed to पलायनं). {@--9@} Obstruction, impediment. {@--10@} Paralysis, stupefaction <ls>K. 141.</ls> {@--11@} Excellence.
